info.title: Briefly Meetings Service
info.description: Meeting scheduling and polling microservice for Briefly with availability checking and booking management

schema.title: Response List Polls Api V1 Meetings Polls Get
Response List Polls Api V1 Meetings Polls  Get
Response Delete Poll Api V1 Meetings Polls  Poll Id  Delete

get.description: Debug endpoint to inspect poll details without authorization.

schema.title: Response Debug Poll Api V1 Meetings Polls  Poll Id  Debug Get
Response Suggest Slots Api V1 Meetings Polls  Poll Id  Suggest Slots Get
Response Schedule Meeting Api V1 Meetings Polls  Poll Id  Schedule Post
Response Unschedule Meeting Api V1 Meetings Polls  Poll Id  Unschedule Post

post.description: Resend invitation email to a specific participant.

schema.title: Response Resend Invitation Api V1 Meetings Polls  Poll Id  Participants  Participant Id  Resend Invitation Post

post.description: Add a new participant to an existing poll.

schema.title: Response Delete Slot Api V1 Meetings Polls  Poll Id  Slots  Slot Id  Delete
Response Send Invitations Api V1 Meetings Polls  Poll Id  Send Invitations  Post

get.description: Get poll data for a specific response token.

schema.title: Response Get Poll By Response Token Api V1 Public Polls Response  Response Token  Get
Response Respond With Token Api V1 Public Polls Response  Response Token  Put
Response Health Check Api V1 Bookings Health Get

get.description: Get public link metadata including template questions
Get available time slots for a public link

post.description: Create a booking from a public link

get.description: List all booking links for the authenticated user

schema.title: Response List Booking Links Api V1 Bookings Links Get

post.description: Create a new evergreen booking link

Response Get Booking Link Api V1 Bookings Links  Link Id  Get
Response Update Booking Link Api V1 Bookings Links  Link Id  Patch
Response Duplicate Booking Link Api V1 Bookings Links  Link Id  Duplicate Post

post.description: Toggle a booking link's active status

schema.title: Response Toggle Booking Link Api V1 Bookings Links  Link Id  Toggle Post

post.description: Create a one-time link for a specific recipient

schema.title: Response Create One Time Link Api V1 Bookings Links  Link Id  One Time Post

get.description: List all one-time links for a specific booking link

schema.title: Response List One Time Links Api V1 Bookings Links  Link Id  One Time Get

get.description: Get analytics for a specific booking link

schema.title: Response Get Link Analytics Api V1 Bookings Links  Link Id  Analytics Get

get.description: List all booking templates for the authenticated user
